      • findThingsMatchingTypeAndKey

        rx.Observable<? extends things.thing.Thing<?>> findThingsMatchingTypeAndKey(String type,
                                                                            String key)

        Returns an Observable of all Things what match the provided type and key.

        Both type and key can be globs, in which case the lookup might take longer since there might be more than one ThingReader configured for a type glob.

        Another example, to find all Things of a certain type you can use “*” as the key.

        Parameters:
        type - the type (or type-glob)
        key - the key (or key-glob)
        Returns:
        an observable of Things that match the provided type and key
